projects.title: When Stars Align
projects.subtitle: Story-driven 3D open world platformer. Here I setup the entire project structure and implemented the whole gameplay logic including Player Controls, Companion Behavior, Input System, Event System, Interaction, Dialog, Localization, Day/Night, World Streaming, UI, Save/Load, Audio, NPC, Quests, Respawn.

projects.title: Lessing Yard
projects.subtitle: Gamified learning platform for students and teachers. In this project, I set up the entire project and app structure on the frontend. I implemented the design and logic for the entire navigation flow (registered/unregistered), onboarding, avatar wardrobe, home screen, settings screen, badge system, ranking system, shop system, mini-games, QR code reader, map, as well as the integration of the backend, multiplayer (via Socket.io), localization, and state management (Redux).

projects.title: Capybaradise
projects.subtitle: Endless 3D-Stacking Game, where you stack as many capybaras as possible with the help of a friendly goose. Here I setup the entire project and implemented the gameplay stacking logic, flying mechanics, camera, UI, app flow, audio, score and online leaderboard.

projects.title: When Stars Fall
projects.subtitle: Rhythm Game with custom built touch sensitive controller. Here i was responsible for the audio design and implementation, part of the gameflow (e.g. spawning planets, showing endscore) and UI, as well as bugfixing.

projects.title: DORIFTO
projects.subtitle: Drift down 高速山! Drift, Speed, Eurobeat! I developed the app by myself.

projects.title: cat baguette
projects.subtitle: Aim your baguette and skillfully throw it to feed the hungry cat. I developed the app by myself.

projects.title: metroidvania-prototype
projects.subtitle: A 2D Platformer controller, which can be used for any 2D Metroidvania type game. I developed the prototype by myself.

projects.title: #onehundred
projects.subtitle: Overcome procedural generated islands with obstacles in #100 seconds. I developed the prototype by myself.

projects.title: SMOL ACADEMY
projects.subtitle: A fast paced 3D Action RPG MOBA game for the browser. I developed the prototype by myself.

projects.title: IVR-HAI: Fetch in Virtual Reality
projects.subtitle: Master Thesis: Social Presence in Immersive Virtual Reality Human-Animal Interaction. I developed the vr-app by myself.

projects.title: Triage MANV
projects.subtitle: Digital support for triage in a mass-casualty incident using Google Glass and a smartwatch. I was responsible for implementing the frontend for both devices.

projects.title: Rapid Mixed Reality Prototyping for Novel Interaction Devices: Evaluating a Transparent Handheld Display
projects.subtitle: Using mixed prototyping, the potential advantages of transparent displays over opaque ones were investigated. I contributed to the conceptual design and co-development of the labyrinth mini-game and also assisted in writing the research paper.

projects.title: Lumi Traces
projects.subtitle: A full-stack application for managing and visualizing Lumi traces on an interactive map. I developed the entire system, including a RESTful CRUD API, backend media uploads, rate limiting, and map and reCAPTCHA integrations.

projects.title: Tuner
projects.subtitle: This is a generic tuner app that can tune guitars, ukuleles, and other instruments. I developed it as a PWA so it can be used offline to tune instruments anytime.
